nodes.text: A male gambler was the owner of the Wookiee slave Bowdaar during the Cold War. Owing a debt to Drooga the Hutt, the gambler left Bowdaar to him as a pledge, but instead of returning and buying him back, simply abandoned Bowdaar to fight in gladiatorial matches.
Unidentified gambler is mentioned in Star Wars: The Old Republic during the Bowdaar companion mission.
